Gresham.University of Western States: University of Western States (formerly known as Western States Chiropractic College) is an integrated health sciences university that offers a variety of health and wellness degrees, including a Doctor of Chiropractic degree. Founded in 1904, UWS is the second oldest chiropractic university in the world. The university has just under 1,000 students enrolled in both online and on campus programs in Portland, Oregon.
